donor_name: UNDP AS ADMINISTRATIVE AGENT FOR A JOINT PROGRAMME PASS THROUGH ARRANGEMENT
outputs.output_descr:
Support implementation of Legal System Development Strategy
Coordinate partnership to implement LSDS and Judicial Reform Strategy 
Strengthen justice branch governance and strategic planning; access to justice and protection of rights; judicial reform

project_descr: The ultimate objective of the Project is to strengthen access to justice and protection of rights in Viet Nam, through continous supports to the implementation of the Strategy for the Development and Improvement of Vietnam's Legal System to the Year 2010
project_title: Strengthening Access to Justice and Protection of Rights
